CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Inpixon Nasdaq: INPX is the innovator of Indoor Intelligence delivering actionable insights for people places and things. Combining the power of mapping positioning and analytics Inpixon helps to create smarter safer and more secure environments. The companys Indoor Intelligence and mobile app solutions are leveraged by a multitude of industries to optimize operations increase productivity and enhance safety. Inpixon customers can take advantage of industry leading location awareness RTLS workplace and hybrid event solutions analytics sensor fusion and the IoT to create exceptional experiences and to do good with indoor data.
